title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 42.0 is found at Snack Brand Walkers and the minimum is found at KP nuts where Snack Brand is 22.0.
The highest Snack Brand Walkers has 20.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Snack Brand KP nuts.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 42.0 is found at Snack Brand Walkers and the minimum is found at KP nuts where Snack Brand is 22.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 42.0 is found at Snack Brand Walkers and the minimum is found at KP nuts where Snack Brand is 22.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 42.0 is found at Snack Brand Walkers and the minimum is found at KP nuts where Snack Brand is 22.0.
The second highest Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the Snack Brand Doritos.
The maximum Snack Brand Walkers has got 1.91 times higher Share of respondents currently purchasing than the minimum Snack Brand KP nuts.
Snack Brand Walkers is higher than any other Snack Brands with value 42.0, followed by Doritos, and Pringles. Down to Snack Brand KP nuts with the lowest value 22.0.
Snack Brand Hula Hoops, and Pringles have a similar Share of respondents currently purchasing that is 26.0.
The Snack Brand Walkers tends to be 1.49 percent higher than average.
